thread.title: WPP punished for slow response to ad upheaval

title: WPP punished for slow response to ad upheaval
text:
WPP punished for slow response to ad upheaval 3:50pm GMT - 01:23 
WPP, the world's biggest advertising group, vowed to break down the barriers between its agencies to support clients better after its worst results since the financial crisis and a disappointing outlook sent its shares plunging. Sonia Legg reports.   
WPP, the world's biggest advertising group, vowed to break down the barriers between its agencies to support clients better after its worst results since the financial crisis and a disappointing outlook sent its shares plunging. Sonia Legg reports.  //reut.rs/2oIjQC7
